name: Recycling

pages.title: Tool recycling
pages.text: Tools and Armor can be disassembled in $(l)Disassembler/$.$(br)$(li)The disassembler will try to deliver the strongest material$(br)$(li)Both of tools should have most or equal harvest level$(br)$(li)Output amount based on material cost$(br)$(li)Also sum more math
